parameters.query:
UPDATE public.profi_price_for_update
SET 
  brand_attr = CASE 
    WHEN brand_attr = '1. ЗАПЧАСТИ ДЛЯ APPLE' THEN 'Apple'
    WHEN brand_attr = '2. ЗАПЧАСТИ ДЛЯ СОТОВЫХ' THEN 'ЗАПЧАСТИ ДЛЯ СОТОВЫХ'
    ELSE brand_attr
  END,
  model_attr = CASE
    WHEN model_attr = 'ЗАПЧАСТИ ДЛЯ APPLE IPAD'   THEN 'iPad'
    WHEN model_attr = 'ЗАПЧАСТИ ДЛЯ APPLE IPHONE' THEN 'iPhone'
    ELSE regexp_replace(model_attr, '^ЗАПЧАСТИ ДЛЯ\s+', '', 'g')
  END;

WITH ins AS ( INSERT INTO public.profi_price ( fix, article, barcode, name, price_rub, stock_stars, note, brand_attr, model_attr, part_type_attr, seller, source_url, loaded_at ) SELECT NULL::text AS fix, u.article, u.barcode, u.name, u.price_rub, u.stock_stars, u.note, u.brand_attr, u.model_attr, u.part_type_attr, u.seller, NULL::text AS source_url, NOW() AS loaded_at FROM public.profi_price_for_update u LEFT JOIN public.profi_price p ON p.article = u.article WHERE p.article IS NULL RETURNING id, article, barcode, name, price_rub, stock_stars, note, brand_attr, model_attr, part_type_attr, seller, loaded_at ) SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ins) AS changed_count, ( SELECT json_agg(t) FROM ( SELECT article, barcode, name, price_rub, stock_stars, note, brand_attr, model_attr, part_type_attr, seller, loaded_at FROM ins ORDER BY article LIMIT 20 ) AS t ) AS sample;

WITH candidates AS (
  SELECT
    p.id,
    p.article,

    -- старые значения из price
    p.brand_attr      AS old_brand_attr,
    p.model_attr      AS old_model_attr,
    p.part_type_attr  AS old_part_type_attr,
    p.seller          AS old_seller,

    -- кандидаты новых значений из price_for_update (если не пустые)
    CASE
      WHEN (p.brand_attr IS NULL OR btrim(p.brand_attr) = '')
       AND COALESCE(btrim(u.brand_attr), '') <> '' THEN u.brand_attr
      ELSE p.brand_attr
    END AS new_brand_attr,

    CASE
      WHEN (p.model_attr IS NULL OR btrim(p.model_attr) = '')
       AND COALESCE(btrim(u.model_attr), '') <> '' THEN u.model_attr
      ELSE p.model_attr
    END AS new_model_attr,

    CASE
      WHEN (p.part_type_attr IS NULL OR btrim(p.part_type_attr) = '')
       AND COALESCE(btrim(u.part_type_attr), '') <> '' THEN u.part_type_attr
      ELSE p.part_type_attr
    END AS new_part_type_attr,

    CASE
      WHEN (p.seller IS NULL OR btrim(p.seller) = '')
       AND COALESCE(btrim(u.seller), '') <> '' THEN u.seller
      ELSE p.seller
    END AS new_seller

  FROM public.profi_price p
  JOIN public.profi_price_for_update u
    ON u.article = p.article
  WHERE
    (
      (p.brand_attr IS NULL OR btrim(p.brand_attr) = '') AND COALESCE(btrim(u.brand_attr), '') <> ''
    ) OR (
      (p.model_attr IS NULL OR btrim(p.model_attr) = '') AND COALESCE(btrim(u.model_attr), '') <> ''
    ) OR (
      (p.part_type_attr IS NULL OR btrim(p.part_type_attr) = '') AND COALESCE(btrim(u.part_type_attr), '') <> ''
    ) OR (
      (p.seller IS NULL OR btrim(p.seller) = '') AND COALESCE(btrim(u.seller), '') <> ''
    )
  FOR UPDATE
),
upd AS (
  UPDATE public.profi_price AS p
  SET
    brand_attr     = c.new_brand_attr,
    model_attr     = c.new_model_attr,
    part_type_attr = c.new_part_type_attr,
    seller         = c.new_seller
  FROM candidates c
  WHERE p.id = c.id
    AND (
      p.brand_attr     IS DISTINCT FROM c.new_brand_attr OR
      p.model_attr     IS DISTINCT FROM c.new_model_attr OR
      p.part_type_attr IS DISTINCT FROM c.new_part_type_attr OR
      p.seller         IS DISTINCT FROM c.new_seller
    )
  RETURNING
    p.article,
    -- до/после + флаги что изменилось
    c.old_brand_attr      AS old_brand_attr,
    p.brand_attr          AS new_brand_attr,
    (c.old_brand_attr IS DISTINCT FROM p.brand_attr)      AS changed_brand_attr,

    c.old_model_attr      AS old_model_attr,
    p.model_attr          AS new_model_attr,
    (c.old_model_attr IS DISTINCT FROM p.model_attr)      AS changed_model_attr,

    c.old_part_type_attr  AS old_part_type_attr,
    p.part_type_attr      AS new_part_type_attr,
    (c.old_part_type_attr IS DISTINCT FROM p.part_type_attr) AS changed_part_type_attr,

    c.old_seller          AS old_seller,
    p.seller              AS new_seller,
    (c.old_seller IS DISTINCT FROM p.seller)              AS changed_seller
)
SELECT
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM upd) AS changed_count,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(t)
    FROM (
      SELECT
        article,
        json_build_object(
          'brand_attr',       json_build_object('old', old_brand_attr,      'new', new_brand_attr,      'changed', changed_brand_attr),
          'model_attr',       json_build_object('old', old_model_attr,      'new', new_model_attr,      'changed', changed_model_attr),
          'part_type_attr',   json_build_object('old', old_part_type_attr,  'new', new_part_type_attr,  'changed', changed_part_type_attr),
          'seller',           json_build_object('old', old_seller,          'new', new_seller,          'changed', changed_seller)
        ) AS changes
      FROM upd
      ORDER BY article
      LIMIT 20
    ) AS t
  ) AS sample;

WITH upd AS (
  UPDATE public.profi_price AS p
  SET price_rub = u.price_rub
  FROM public.profi_price_for_update AS u
  WHERE u.article = p.article
    AND p.price_rub IS DISTINCT FROM u.price_rub
  RETURNING
    p.article,
    p.price_rub AS old_price_rub,
    u.price_rub AS new_price_rub
)
SELECT
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM upd) AS changed_count,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(t)
    FROM (
      SELECT article, old_price_rub, new_price_rub
      FROM upd
      ORDER BY article
      LIMIT 20
    ) AS t
  ) AS sample;

WITH batch_sellers AS (
  -- Продавцы, присутствующие в текущем батче, но только "Профи"
  SELECT DISTINCT seller
  FROM public.profi_price_for_update
  WHERE seller = 'Профи'
),
candidates AS (
  -- 1) Обновляем, если (article, seller) есть в батче и stock_stars отличается
  SELECT
    p.id,
    p.article,
    p.seller,
    p.stock_stars AS old_stock_stars,
    u.stock_stars AS new_stock_stars
  FROM public.profi_price p
  JOIN public.profi_price_for_update u
    ON u.article = p.article
   AND u.seller  IS NOT DISTINCT FROM p.seller
  JOIN batch_sellers bs
    ON bs.seller IS NOT DISTINCT FROM p.seller
  WHERE p.seller = 'Профи'
    AND p.stock_stars IS DISTINCT FROM u.stock_stars

  UNION ALL

  -- 2) Обнуляем, если (article, seller) нет в батче у того же продавца
  SELECT
    p.id,
    p.article,
    p.seller,
    p.stock_stars AS old_stock_stars,
    0             AS new_stock_stars
  FROM public.profi_price p
  JOIN batch_sellers bs
    ON bs.seller IS NOT DISTINCT FROM p.seller
  WHERE p.seller = 'Профи'
    AND p.stock_stars IS DISTINCT FROM 0
    AND NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1
      FROM public.profi_price_for_update u
      WHERE u.article = p.article
        AND u.seller  IS NOT DISTINCT FROM p.seller
    )
),
upd AS (
  UPDATE public.profi_price AS p
  SET stock_stars = c.new_stock_stars
  FROM candidates c
  WHERE p.id = c.id
  RETURNING
    p.article,
    c.old_stock_stars,
    c.new_stock_stars
)
SELECT
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM upd) AS changed_count,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(t)
    FROM (
      SELECT article, old_stock_stars, new_stock_stars
      FROM upd
      ORDER BY article
      LIMIT 20
    ) AS t
  ) AS sample;

INSERT INTO profi_price (
    id, 
    article, 
    barcode, 
    name, 
    price_rub, 
    stock_stars, 
    loaded_at,
    note,
    brand_attr,
    model_attr,
    part_type_attr,
    seller
)
SELECT 
    gen_random_uuid() as id,
    article,
    barcode,
    name,
    price_rub,
    stock_stars,
    NOW() as loaded_at,
    note,
    brand_attr,
    model_attr,
    part_type_attr,
    seller
FROM profi_price_for_update u
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM profi_price p 
    WHERE p.article = u.article 
      AND p.barcode IS NOT DISTINCT FROM u.barcode
);

nodes.name: Copy data from price_for_update to price

parameters.query:
WITH dla_data AS (
    SELECT 
        id,
        part_type_attr,
        -- Считаем количество вхождений "ДЛЯ"
        (LENGTH(UPPER(part_type_attr)) - LENGTH(REPLACE(UPPER(part_type_attr), 'ДЛЯ', ''))) / 3 as dla_count,
        -- Находим позицию первого "ДЛЯ"
        POSITION('ДЛЯ' IN UPPER(part_type_attr)) as first_dla_pos,
        -- Находим позицию второго "ДЛЯ" (если есть)
        CASE 
            WHEN (LENGTH(UPPER(part_type_attr)) - LENGTH(REPLACE(UPPER(part_type_attr), 'ДЛЯ', ''))) / 3 >= 2 THEN
                POSITION('ДЛЯ' IN UPPER(SUBSTRING(part_type_attr FROM POSITION('ДЛЯ' IN UPPER(part_type_attr)) + 3)))
            ELSE 0
        END as second_dla_pos_relative
    FROM profi_price_for_update
    WHERE model_attr ILIKE '%iPhone%' 
    AND part_type_attr IS NOT NULL
    AND part_type_attr ILIKE '%ДЛЯ%'
)
UPDATE profi_price_for_update p
SET part_type_attr = CASE 
    WHEN d.dla_count = 1 THEN
        TRIM(SUBSTRING(d.part_type_attr FROM 1 FOR d.first_dla_pos - 1))
    WHEN d.dla_count >= 2 THEN
        TRIM(SUBSTRING(
            d.part_type_attr 
            FROM 1 
            FOR d.first_dla_pos + d.second_dla_pos_relative + 1
        ))
    ELSE p.part_type_attr
END
FROM dla_data d
WHERE p.id = d.id;

UPDATE profi_price_for_update
SET 
    brand_attr = TRIM(model_attr),
    model_attr = NULL
WHERE model_attr IS NOT NULL 
  AND TRIM(model_attr) != '';

WITH model_patterns AS (
  SELECT unnest(ARRAY[
    '16 Pro Max','15 Pro Max','14 Pro Max','13 Pro Max','12 Pro Max','11 Pro Max',
    '16 Plus','15 Plus','14 Plus',
    '16 Pro','15 Pro','14 Pro','13 Pro','12 Pro','11 Pro',
    '13 Mini','12 Mini',
    'XS Max','8 Plus','7 Plus','6S Plus','6 Plus',
    'SE 2022','SE 2020',
    '16e',
    '16','15','14','13','12','11',
    'XS','XR','X','8','7','6S','6','5S','5C','5','SE','4S','4'
  ]) AS model
),
rows AS (
  SELECT id, name
  FROM public.profi_price_for_update
  WHERE brand_attr = 'iPhone' AND name IS NOT NULL
),
pat AS (
  SELECT '(?i)\y(' || string_agg(regexp_replace(model, '\s+', ' ', 'g'), '|') || ')\y' AS rx
  FROM model_patterns
),
hits AS (
  SELECT r.id,
         mp.model AS canonical_model,
         m.m[1]   AS matched_text,
         position(lower(mp.model) in lower(r.name)) AS pos,
         length(mp.model) AS len
  FROM rows r
  CROSS JOIN pat p
  CROSS JOIN LATERAL regexp_matches(r.name, p.rx, 'g') AS m(m)
  JOIN model_patterns mp
    ON lower(m.m[1]) = lower(mp.model)
),
uniq AS (
  SELECT id, canonical_model, MIN(pos) AS pos, MAX(len) AS len
  FROM hits
  GROUP BY id, canonical_model
),
dedup AS (
  SELECT id,
         string_agg(canonical_model, '|' ORDER BY pos, len DESC) AS models_pipe
  FROM uniq
  GROUP BY id
)
UPDATE public.profi_price_for_update pfu
SET model_attr = d.models_pipe
FROM dedup d
WHERE d.id = pfu.id
  -- обновляем только если значение реально изменится
  AND COALESCE(pfu.model_attr,'') IS DISTINCT FROM COALESCE(d.models_pipe,'')
RETURNING
  pfu.id,
  pfu.name,
  COALESCE(pfu.model_attr,'')  AS old_model_attr,
  COALESCE(d.models_pipe,'')   AS new_model_attr;

UPDATE profi_price p
SET model_attr     = u.model_attr,
    brand_attr     = u.brand_attr,
    part_type_attr = u.part_type_attr
FROM profi_price_for_update u
WHERE p.article = u.article
  -- обновляем только если значения реально отличаются
  AND (
    COALESCE(p.model_attr,'')     IS DISTINCT FROM COALESCE(u.model_attr,'')
    OR COALESCE(p.brand_attr,'')  IS DISTINCT FROM COALESCE(u.brand_attr,'')
    OR COALESCE(p.part_type_attr,'') IS DISTINCT FROM COALESCE(u.part_type_attr,'')
  )
RETURNING
  p.id,
  p.article,
  p.name,
  p.model_attr     AS new_model_attr,
  p.brand_attr     AS new_brand_attr,
  p.part_type_attr AS new_part_type_attr;

WITH src AS (
  SELECT
    id,
    -- 1) brand_attr -> "АКБ"
    'АКБ'::text AS interim_brand,
    -- 2) part_type_attr: если "АККУМУЛЯТОРЫ" → "УНИВЕРСАЛЬНЫЙ",
    --    иначе отрезаем первые 4 символа (с 5-го до конца)
    CASE
      WHEN part_type_attr IS NULL THEN NULL
      WHEN btrim(part_type_attr) = 'АККУМУЛЯТОРЫ' THEN 'УНИВЕРСАЛЬНЫЙ'
      ELSE btrim(SUBSTRING(part_type_attr FROM 5))
    END AS interim_part
  FROM public.profi_price_for_update
  WHERE brand_attr ILIKE 'АКБ ДЛЯ МОБИЛЬНОЙ ТЕХНИКИ'
),
swapped AS (
  -- 3) Итог: меняем местами рассчитанные значения
  SELECT
    id,
    interim_part  AS new_brand_attr,
    interim_brand AS new_part_type_attr
  FROM src
)
UPDATE public.profi_price_for_update p
SET
  brand_attr     = s.new_brand_attr,
  part_type_attr = s.new_part_type_attr
FROM swapped s
WHERE p.id = s.id
RETURNING p.id, p.name, p.brand_attr AS brand_after, p.part_type_attr AS part_type_after;

UPDATE public.profi_price_for_update
SET brand_attr = 'УНИВЕРСАЛЬНЫЙ'
WHERE brand_attr = 'УНИВЕРСАЛЬНЫЕ ЗАПЧАСТИ'
RETURNING id, name, brand_attr;

UPDATE public.profi_price_for_update
SET part_type_attr = CASE TRIM(part_type_attr)
  WHEN 'АКБ' THEN 'АКБ'
  WHEN 'АНТЕННЫЙ ПРОВОД' THEN 'АНТЕННЫЙ ПРОВОД'
  WHEN 'ВИНТЫ' THEN 'ВИНТЫ'
  WHEN 'ДЕРЖАТЕЛИ SIM' THEN 'ДЕРЖАТЕЛИ, КОННЕКТОРЫ SIM/КАРТЫ ПАМЯТИ'
  WHEN 'ДЕРЖАТЕЛИ, КОННЕКТОРЫ SIM/КАРТЫ ПАМЯТИ' THEN 'ДЕРЖАТЕЛИ, КОННЕКТОРЫ SIM/КАРТЫ ПАМЯТИ'
  WHEN 'КОННЕКТОРЫ SIM/КАРТЫ ПАМЯТИ' THEN 'ДЕРЖАТЕЛИ, КОННЕКТОРЫ SIM/КАРТЫ ПАМЯТИ'
  WHEN 'ДЖОЙСТИКИ' THEN 'ДЖОЙСТИК'
  WHEN 'ДИНАМИК' THEN 'ЗВОНКИ, ДИНАМИКИ, ВИБРОМОТОРЫ'
  WHEN 'ЗВОНКИ, ВИБРОЗВОНКИ, ДИНАМИКИ' THEN 'ЗВОНКИ, ДИНАМИКИ, ВИБРОМОТОРЫ'
  WHEN 'ЗВОНКИ, ДИНАМИКИ' THEN 'ЗВОНКИ, ДИНАМИКИ, ВИБРОМОТОРЫ'
  WHEN 'ДИСПЛЕИ' THEN 'ДИСПЛЕЙ'
  WHEN 'ДИСПЛЕИ INCELL' THEN 'ДИСПЛЕЙ'
  WHEN 'ДИСПЛЕИ OLED' THEN 'ДИСПЛЕЙ'
  WHEN 'ДИСПЛЕИ ORIGINAL' THEN 'ДИСПЛЕЙ'
  WHEN 'ДИСПЛЕИ PREMIUM' THEN 'ДИСПЛЕЙ'
  WHEN 'ДИСПЛЕИ TIANMA' THEN 'ДИСПЛЕЙ'
  WHEN 'ЗАГЛУШКИ' THEN 'ЗАГЛУШКА'
  WHEN 'ЗАДНИЕ КРЫШКИ' THEN 'КРЫШКА ЗАДНЯЯ'
  WHEN 'ЗАДНЯЯ КРЫШКИ' THEN 'КРЫШКА ЗАДНЯЯ'
  WHEN 'КАМЕРЫ' THEN 'КАМЕРА'
  WHEN 'КНОПКИ' THEN 'КНОПКИ'
  WHEN 'КНОПКИ ВКЛЮЧЕНИЯ' THEN 'КНОПКИ'
  WHEN 'КНОПКИ ВКЛЮЧЕНИЯ, ТОЛКАТЕЛИ' THEN 'КНОПКИ'
  WHEN 'КОРПУСА' THEN 'КОРПУС'
  WHEN 'МИКРОСХЕМЫ' THEN 'МИКРОСХЕМА'
  WHEN 'МИКРОФОНЫ' THEN 'МИКРОФОН'
  WHEN 'ПЛАТЫ КЛАВИАТУРЫ' THEN 'ПЛАТА КЛАВИАТУРЫ'
  WHEN 'ПРОКЛЕЙКИ ДЛЯ ДИСПЛЕЙНЫХ МОДУЛЕЙ И ЗАДНИХ КРЫШЕК' THEN 'СКОТЧ, ПРОКЛЕЙКА'
  WHEN 'РАЗЪЕМЫ' THEN 'РАЗЪЕМ'
  WHEN 'РАЗЪЕМЫ ДЛЯ ЗАРЯДКИ' THEN 'РАЗЪЕМ'
  WHEN 'РАЗЪЕМЫ ДЛЯ ЗАРЯДКИ, АУДИО РАЗЪЕМЫ' THEN 'РАЗЪЕМ'
  WHEN 'РАЗЪЕМЫ ЗАРЯДКИ' THEN 'РАЗЪЕМ'
  WHEN 'РАМКИ' THEN 'РАМКА'
  WHEN 'СКОТЧ ДЛЯ ФИКСАЦИИ АКБ' THEN 'СКОТЧ, ПРОКЛЕЙКА'
  WHEN 'СТЕКЛА КАМЕРЫ' THEN 'СТЕКЛО'
  WHEN 'СТЕКЛО КАМЕРЫ' THEN 'СТЕКЛО'
  WHEN 'ТАЧСКРИНЫ' THEN 'ТАЧСКРИН'
  WHEN 'ТАЧСКРИНЫ ДЛЯ IPAD' THEN 'ТАЧСКРИН'
  WHEN 'ШЛЕЙФА' THEN 'ШЛЕЙФ'
  WHEN 'ШЛЕЙФА ДЛЯ IPAD' THEN 'ШЛЕЙФ'
  ELSE TRIM(part_type_attr)
END
WHERE TRIM(part_type_attr) IN (
  'АКБ','АНТЕННЫЙ ПРОВОД','ВИНТЫ',
  'ДЕРЖАТЕЛИ SIM','ДЕРЖАТЕЛИ, КОННЕКТОРЫ SIM/КАРТЫ ПАМЯТИ','КОННЕКТОРЫ SIM/КАРТЫ ПАМЯТИ',
  'ДЖОЙСТИКИ','ДИНАМИК','ЗВОНКИ, ВИБРОЗВОНКИ, ДИНАМИКИ','ЗВОНКИ, ДИНАМИКИ',
  'ДИСПЛЕИ','ДИСПЛЕИ INCELL','ДИСПЛЕИ OLED','ДИСПЛЕИ ORIGINAL','ДИСПЛЕИ PREMIUM','ДИСПЛЕИ TIANMA',
  'ЗАГЛУШКИ','ЗАДНИЕ КРЫШКИ','ЗАДНЯЯ КРЫШКИ',
  'КАМЕРЫ','КНОПКИ','КНОПКИ ВКЛЮЧЕНИЯ','КНОПКИ ВКЛЮЧЕНИЯ, ТОЛКАТЕЛИ',
  'КОРПУСА','МИКРОСХЕМЫ','МИКРОФОНЫ','ПЛАТЫ КЛАВИАТУРЫ',
  'ПРОКЛЕЙКИ ДЛЯ ДИСПЛЕЙНЫХ МОДУЛЕЙ И ЗАДНИХ КРЫШЕК',
  'РАЗЪЕМЫ','РАЗЪЕМЫ ДЛЯ ЗАРЯДКИ','РАЗЪЕМЫ ДЛЯ ЗАРЯДКИ, АУДИО РАЗЪЕМЫ','РАЗЪЕМЫ ЗАРЯДКИ',
  'РАМКИ','СКОТЧ ДЛЯ ФИКСАЦИИ АКБ',
  'СТЕКЛА КАМЕРЫ','СТЕКЛО КАМЕРЫ',
  'ТАЧСКРИНЫ','ТАЧСКРИНЫ ДЛЯ IPAD',
  'ШЛЕЙФА','ШЛЕЙФА ДЛЯ IPAD'
)
RETURNING id, part_type_attr;

nodes.name: Приводим к единому виду тип запчасти

parameters.jsCode:
// вернёт ровно один пустой item
return [{}];

parameters.query:
UPDATE profi_price p
SET
    model_attr     = u.model_attr,
    brand_attr     = u.brand_attr,
    part_type_attr = u.part_type_attr
FROM profi_price_for_update u
WHERE p.article = u.article
  AND p.seller  = u.seller;

value.name: ={{ $json.__EMPTY_4 }}

main.node: Copy data from price_for_update to price
Приводим к единому виду тип запчасти
